author: Daniel Greene
description:
Welcome to another episode of Fantasy News with Daniel Greene, where we bring you the latest and greatest updates from the fantasy and sci-fi worlds! Thank you Squarespace for sponsoring today's video: https://www.squarespace.com/danielgreene  This week, we’ve got exciting news about Arcane, a new Witcher cover reveal, epic book announcements, and much more. Grab a coffee, and settle in.

📰 News Stories Covered in This Episode
00:00 Intro

01:20 Arcane Show Updates
Big news for fans of Arcane! The showrunner has revealed that three more League of Legends TV shows are in production.
Read more here: https://www.dexerto.com/tv-movies/arcane-showrunner-reveals-3-more-league-of-legends-tv-shows-in-production-2988970/
Clarification from Marc Merril: https://x.com/MarcMerrill/status/1861084272854999418?s=19

03:53 Cold Eternity
Explore this thrilling new sci-fi release:
Details: https://us.macmillan.com/books/9781250884954/coldeternity

05:53 NEW WITCHER COVER!!!
